listProblem.detailsInfo:
Reports comments that contain Java code.

Usually, code that is commented out gets outdated very quickly and becomes misleading.
As most projects use some kind of version control system,
it is better to delete commented out code completely and use the VCS history instead.

New in 2020.3

listProblem.comment: Field can be converted to a local variable
listProblem.detailsInfo:
Reports redundant class fields that can be replaced with local variables.

If all local usages of a field are preceded by assignments to that field, the
field can be removed, and its usages can be replaced with local variables.

Reports regular expressions that can be simplified.

**Example:**


      [a] xx* [ah-hz]

After the quick-fix is applied:


      a x+ [ahz]

New in 2022.1

listProblem.comment: `continue` is unnecessary as the last statement in a loop
